featured.text:
The Halo legend Naded! He has been playing video games professionally for 9 years and has competed in hundreds of Halo competitions. He is known for being one of the best players to ever play Halo 2/3/Reach/4 and has placed among the top in all types of major Halo tournaments for the entirety of his gaming career. If you like great entertaining viewer interaction while at the same time top tier gameplay come check him out! You will not be disappointed!


Click here to watch and chat!
